trans-unit.source: Indicates how side-by-side assemblies are configured for <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica como os assemblies lado-a-lado são configurados para <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption> is used for the value of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption> é usado para o valor de <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Side-by-side assemblies are not used within the enclosed context.
trans-unit.target: Os assemblies lado a lado não são usados dentro do contexto incluído.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption.Ignore" /> is the default setting for <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption" /> when <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Ignore" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption.Ignore" /> é a configuração padrão para <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption" /> quando <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance" /> está definido como <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Ignore" />.

trans-unit.source: The current side-by-side assembly of the enclosed context is used.
trans-unit.target: O assembly lado a lado atual do contexto incluído é usado.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption.Inherit" /> is the default setting for <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption" /> when <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption.Inherit" /> é a configuração padrão para <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption" /> quando <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance" /> está definido como <see cref="F:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Inherit" />.

trans-unit.source: A new side-by-side assembly is created for the enclosed context.
trans-unit.target: Um novo assembly lado a lado é criado para o contexto incluído.
